text: John William Welton (December 9, 1929 - May 9, 2013) was a Canadian football player who played for the Montreal Alouettes, Ottawa Rough Riders and Toronto Argonauts. He played college football at Wake Forest University, Queen's University and Stanford University.http://www.justsportsstats.com/footballstatsindex.php?player_id=weltojoh001 ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2013 deaths
title: John Welton
